name: HostForLIFE.eu
tag_list: asp-net-4-5-european-hosting, asp-net-4-0-european-hosting, windows-2012-european-hosting, sql-2012-european-hosting, sharepoint-2013-european-hosting, asp-net-mvc-4-0-european-hosting, vs-lightswitch-european-hosting, webdeploy-hosting, webmatrix-hosting
overview:
HostForLIFE.eu is European Windows Hosting Provider which focuses on Windows Platform only. We deliver on-demand hosting solutions including Shared hosting, Reseller Hosting, Cloud Hosting, Dedicated Servers, and IT as a Service for companies of all sizes.

HostForLIFE.eu goals are to provide constant uptime and providing excellent customer service.

Join HostForLIFE today and enjoy the wonderfull ride!
